ygData.subject: RE: Bard Handicap of Sorts
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I wouldn t be so sure.  About two patches ago, there was a minor note about monsters now tracking correctly when moving into/out of water.  Before, when I
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 7 Dec 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Was probably a spectre, they wander over from Spectre Isle occasionally and
> I've had to outrun them a few times. Skeletons sink like stones.

I wouldn't be so sure. About two patches ago, there was a
minor note about monsters now tracking correctly when moving
into/out of water. Before, when I had a cyclops chasing me in
the OOT, I'd run over the water (levitated), it would chase me
and disappear underwater. Now, I'll run over the water, and
it'll sort of wade through, never actually dropping below the
water's surface.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
